医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究为戊型肝炎病毒的进化动态提供了宝贵的见解多种药物的联合治疗比仅一种活性化合物更有效。至少首先是这样。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/Study-provides-valuable-insights-into-the-evolutionary-dynamics-of-hepatitis-E-virus.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/Study-provides-valuable-insights-into-the-evolutionary-dynamics-of-hepatitis-E-virus.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b2187b89-c2a0-4e86-9b8b-9c68b8c74837 Tue, 23 Jan 2024 13:17:48 -0500 Study provides valuable insights into the evolutionary dynamics of hepatitis E virus
NIH 拨款资助同种异体移植排斥芯片模型的开发寺崎生物医学创新研究所助理教授 Vadim Jucaud 博士获得了美国国立卫生研究院的资助，用于开发功能性器官芯片来模拟同种异体移植排斥反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/NIH-grant-funds-the-development-of-allograft-rejection-on-a-chip-model.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/NIH-grant-funds-the-development-of-allograft-rejection-on-a-chip-model.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=235256a8-ae12-47d0-b890-85aa4ca11687 Tue, 23 Jan 2024 13:12:25 -0500 NIH grant funds the development of allograft-rejection-on-a-chip model
SynNeurGe：用于帕金森病研究的新生物分类系统开发帕金森病的有效治疗方法如此具有挑战性的原因之一是其复杂性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/SynNeurGe-A-new-biological-classification-system-for-Parkinsons-disease-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/SynNeurGe-A-new-biological-classification-system-for-Parkinsons-disease-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1a844fe5-7382-433f-902e-beb3cd339ffe Tue, 23 Jan 2024 13:07:52 -0500 SynNeurGe: A new biological classification system for Parkinson's disease research
童年时期的照顾者温暖可以保护以后的心血管健康先前的研究已经证实，童年时期在家庭中遭受虐待、忽视和滥用药物的经历可能会恶化一个人一生的心脏健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/Caregiver-warmth-during-childhood-protects-cardioangio-health-later-in-life.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/Caregiver-warmth-during-childhood-protects-cardioangio-health-later-in-life.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=75c5f04a-a275-4c6a-a96d-97ce6393c68e Tue, 23 Jan 2024 13:00:18 -0500 Caregiver warmth during childhood protects cardiovascular health later in life
用布尔网络模型揭示基因的逻辑在过去的 20 年里，生物学和医学研究人员创建了布尔网络模型来模拟复杂系统并寻找解决方案，包括结直肠癌的新疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/Unraveling-the-logic-of-genes-with-Boolean-network-models.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/Unraveling-the-logic-of-genes-with-Boolean-network-models.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1a9ab907-4e2e-4b83-8b17-fc3faee83ca6 Tue, 23 Jan 2024 12:21:35 -0500 Unraveling the logic of genes with Boolean network models
新研究揭示了医院获得性肺炎治疗中对抗耐药性的有效策略一种用于研究美罗培南耐药性发展的新型兔感染模型。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/New-study-reveals- effective-strategies-against-drug-resistance-in-hospital-acquired-pneumonia-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/New-study-reveals- effective-strategies-against-drug-resistance-in-hospital-acquired-pneumonia-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=773e8013-34cc-4c1b-9c44-3f2206a5ea3a Tue, 23 Jan 2024 12:16:00 -0500 New study reveals effective strategies against drug resistance in hospital-acquired pneumonia treatment
AI模型准确预测非功能性胰腺神经内分泌肿瘤淋巴结转移无功能性胰腺神经内分泌肿瘤虽然罕见，但主要通过手术治疗。淋巴结转移的存在与否在很大程度上影响手术和其他治疗方法的选择。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/AI-model-accurately-predicts-lymph-node-metastasis-in-nonfunction-pancreatic-neuroendocrine-tumors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/AI-model-accurately-predicts-lymph-node-metastasis-in-nonfunction-pancreatic-neuroendocrine-tumors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=49e5296e-bf08-42e8-bccb-dda214c2dc40 Tue, 23 Jan 2024 11:55:54 -0500 AI model accurately predicts lymph node metastasis in nonfunctional pancreatic neuroendocrine tumors
研究发现 X 染色体上有 23 个与肾脏健康相关的新遗传标记对 908,697 个样本进行荟萃分析，以调查肾脏特征的遗传、性别依赖性基础。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/Study-uncovers-23-new-genic-markers-linked-to-kidney-health-on-the-X-chromosome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/Study-uncovers-23-new-genic-markers-linked-to-kidney-health-on-the-X-chromosome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=49c2d891-b49a-4404-a95a-3afc7d243c3b Tue, 23 Jan 2024 11:49:00 -0500 Study uncovers 23 new genetic markers linked to kidney health on the X-chromosome
APOE4 阿尔茨海默病遗传风险因素与亚临床动脉粥样硬化风险增加相关马德里国家心血管研究中心的科学家发现，载脂蛋白 E4 (APOE4) 是阿尔茨海默病最有效的遗传风险因素之一，它也与中年发生亚临床动脉粥样硬化的风险增加有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/APOE4-genic-risk-factors-for-Alzheimers-disease-linked-with-increased-risk-of-subclinical-atherosclerosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/APOE4-genic-risk-factors-for-Alzheimers-disease-linked-with-increased-risk-of-subclinical-atherosclerosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=57f04cc3-2a0c-4533-953c-3cb42fba929f Tue, 23 Jan 2024 11:23:52 -0500 APOE4 genetic risk factors for Alzheimer's disease associated with increased risk of subclinical atherosclerosis
C-Path 的 TRxA 启动 2024 年拨款以促进下一代疗法Critical Path Institute (C-Path) 转化治疗加速器 (TRxA) 今天宣布了 2024 年全球药物开发突破性研究和创新资助（也称为 BRIDGe）提案征集。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/C-Paths-TRxA-launches-2024-grants-to-boost-next-gen-therapeutics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/C-Paths-TRxA-launches-2024-grants-to-boost-next-gen-therapeutics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=08f515f8-8e92-484a-b116-aa48c442f744 Tue, 23 Jan 2024 11:09:17 -0500 C-Path's TRxA launches 2024 grants to boost next-gen therapeutics
